item.title: 淡马锡任命前星展集团首席执行官古普塔为印度董事长
item.description: 星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd. ）前首席执行官皮尤什-古普塔（Piyush Gupta）将从 12 月 1 日起担任淡马锡国际印度业务主席。【原文：Piyush Gupta, the former Chief Executive Officer at DBS Group Holdings Ltd., will become chairman of Temasek International’s Indian operations from Dec. 1.】

item.title: 上海成立大型大宗商品交易公司提升影响力
item.description: 上海成立了一家国有大宗商品贸易公司，以加强上海在国内和国际原材料市场中的作用。【原文：Shanghai has set up a state-owned commodities trading firm in a bid to strengthen the city’s role in both domestic and international raw materials markets.】

item.title: 数据中心故障导致 CME 期货交易周五停止
item.description: 芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group）驻新加坡发言人称，由于技术问题，芝加哥商品交易所的商品期货和期权现场交易于周五停止。【原文：Live trading of commodities futures and options on the Chicago Mercantile Exchange halted on Friday due to technical issues, according to a Singapore-based spokesperson for CME Group.】

item.title: 日本两年期债券销售需求低于 12 个月平均水平
item.description: 由于对日本央行近期加息的预期不断升温，投资者对日本两年期国债的需求低于 12 个月的平均水平。【原文：Japan’s two-year government bond auction Friday saw demand that was weaker than the 12-month average, as rising expectations of a near-term Bank of Japan rate hike sapped investor appetite.】

item.title: 韩联社称朝鲜涉嫌黑客攻击 3,000 万美元加密货币
item.description: 据韩联社报道，朝鲜黑客组织 Lazarus 被怀疑是一个漏洞的幕后黑手，该漏洞周四导致韩国最大的加密货币交易所 Upbit 的 450 亿韩元（约合 3000 万美元）被盗。【原文：North Korean hacking group Lazarus is suspected of being behind an exploit that saw 45 billion won (about $30 million) drained from South Korea’s largest crypto exchange Upbit on Thursday, Yonhap News reported.】

item.title: 中国要求马来西亚和柬埔寨澄清与美国的贸易协议
item.description: 中国就马来西亚和柬埔寨上个月与美国签署的贸易协议向两国提出了抱怨，这凸显了各国在北京与华盛顿的竞争中必须达成的微妙平衡。【原文：China complained to Malaysia and Cambodia about the trade deals they signed with the US last month, underscoring the delicate balance countries must strike in the rivalry between Beijing and Washington.】

item.title: 韩国科斯达克小型股指数因税收减免报告而大涨
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，韩国政府正计划推出税收优惠政策，并采取措施增加养老基金和其他机构的股票购买量，此后韩国小型股科斯达克指数（Kosdaq Index）大涨。【原文：South Korea’s small-cap Kosdaq Index surged after a local media report that the government is planning to roll out tax incentives and take steps to increase stock buying by pension funds and other institutions.】

item.title: 美国液化天然气出口创历史新高，正好满足冬季需求
item.description: 本月美国液化天然气出口量将创下历史新高，有助于在冬季来临之际平抑亚洲和欧洲的天然气价格。【原文：US liquefied natural gas exports are set to hit a record high this month, helping to tame prices in Asia and Europe as winter begins.】

item.title: 印度恐慌指数将创 5 月以来最大单周跌幅
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 谷歌人工智能进展推动联发科创下 2002 年以来最佳一周业绩
item.description: 联发科技公司（MediaTek Inc.【原文：MediaTek Inc. shares are poised for their best week since 2002, as artificial intelligence advances at its client Google help reshape the growth outlook for the Taiwanese chipmaker.】

item.title: 三井OSK考虑在下一个中期计划中逐步分红
item.description: 三井物产航运株式会社首席执行官桥本武表示，公司计划在下一个中期计划中引入渐进式分红政策。【原文：Mitsui OSK Lines Ltd. plans to introduce a progressive dividend policy in its next medium-term plan, Chief Executive Officer Takeshi Hashimoto said.】

item.title: 高盛认为中国争端将通过旅游业冲击日本国内生产总值
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Rising tensions with China may shave about 0.2 percentage point off Japan’s gross domestic product growth if tourism and the export of consumer goods to the world’s second-largest economy decline, according to economists at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 美国贸易协议困境令印度经济增长前景黯淡
item.description: 印度经济和金融市场对增长前景发出了相互矛盾的信号，使决策者支持经济活动的努力变得更加复杂，因为美国的高关税对前景造成了压力。【原文：India’s economy and financial markets are sending conflicting signals about the growth outlook, complicating policymakers’ efforts to support activity as high US tariffs weigh on prospects.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司因油价低迷将五年计划削减至 1,090 亿美元
item.description: 巴西石油巨头巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）宣布将其下一个五年投资计划减少 2%，减至 1,090 亿美元，以在国际油价下跌时保护其现金流。【原文：Brazilian oil major Petrobras announced a 2% decrease in its next five-year investment plan to $109 billion in a move to shield its cash flow at a time of lower international oil prices.】

item.title: Nexperia 称客户仍报告即将停产
item.description: Nexperia 警告说，各行业的客户即将面临停产，同时呼吁其中国部门采取具体措施重新建立对话。【原文：Nexperia warned that customers across industries are facing impending production halts, while calling on its Chinese unit to take concrete steps to re-establish dialog.】

item.title: 淡水河谷因产量和铁矿石价格强劲而提高投资者回报率
item.description: 巴西铁矿石巨头淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）将向股东派发特别股息，原因是该公司今年的经营业绩强劲，炼钢原料价格高企。【原文：Brazilian iron ore heavyweight Vale SA will pay a special dividend to shareholders on the back of its strong operational performance and high prices of the steelmaking ingredient this year.】

item.title: 受美联储降息乐观情绪影响，黄金有望实现第四个月上涨
item.description: 由于有迹象表明美联储将在下个月降息，黄金持稳，并有望实现第四次月度上涨，这为贵金属提供了支撑。【原文：Gold was steady — and on track for a fourth monthly gain — as signs the Federal Reserve will cut rates next month supported the precious metal.】

item.title: 东京通胀率高于预期，日本央行将继续加息
item.description: 东京的通胀率保持稳定，工业产出意外增长，使日本央行有望在 12 月或 1 月考虑加息。【原文：Tokyo’s inflation held steady and industrial output unexpectedly rose, keeping the Bank of Japan on track to consider an interest rate hike in December or January.】

item.title: 石油创 2023 年以来最差月度表现，欧佩克+、乌克兰成为焦点
item.description: 石油创下两年多来最长的月度跌势，因为交易商们期待本周末的欧佩克+会议，并评估美国主导的结束乌克兰冲突的努力。【原文：Oil headed for the longest run of monthly losses in more than two years, as traders looked ahead to an OPEC+ meeting this weekend and gauged US-led efforts to end the conflict in Ukraine.】

item.title: 中国电动车利润困境加剧市场对 2026 年挑战的担忧
item.description: 中国电动汽车股的投资者一直希望强劲的财报季能带来新的动力。然而，令人失望的业绩却加剧了人们对未来的担忧。【原文：Investors in Chinese electric vehicle stocks had been hoping for a strong earnings season to provide a fresh tailwind. Instead, disappointing results have stoked anxiety about what lies ahead.】

item.title: 中国的价格战让美团面临自2022年以来的首次亏损
item.description: 由于价格战导致在线外卖巨头美团出现近三年来的首次亏损，美团股价可能会延续其在中国科技同行中的低迷表现。【原文：Meituan shares may extend their underperformance against Chinese tech peers as price wars drive the online delivery giant to its first loss in nearly three years.】

item.title: 全球股市涨势停滞，亚洲股市退潮：市场综述
item.description: 由于全球股市在过去一周的大幅反弹开始停滞，亚洲股市周五开盘表现平淡。【原文：Asian stocks were set for a muted open Friday as a sharp rebound in global equities over the past week began to stall.】

item.title: Mercuria 和 Vitol 是阿根廷 Raizen 炼油厂的竞标者之一
item.description: 据知情人士透露，能源贸易巨头摩科瑞能源集团（Mercuria Energy Group）和维托尔集团（Vitol Group）是 Raizen SA 出售阿根廷一家炼油厂和数百家加油站的最终竞标者之一。【原文：Energy trading giants Mercuria Energy Group and Vitol Group are among finalists for a refinery and hundreds of gas stations in Argentina being sold by Raizen SA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 丹麦首位女中央银行行长 Bodil Nyboe Andersen 逝世，享年 85 岁
item.description: 丹麦首位女性央行行长博迪尔-尼博-安德森（Bodil Nyboe Andersen）去世。【原文：Bodil Nyboe Andersen, Denmark’s first female central bank governor, has died.】

item.title: 国防初创企业量子系统公司估值增至三倍，达 30 亿欧元
item.description: 量子系统公司（Quantum Systems）是一家由彼得-蒂尔（Peter Thiel）支持的德国无人机制造商，该公司在新一轮融资中将其估值提高到 30 亿欧元（35 亿美元），这家国防初创公司计划提高无人机系统的生产能力。【原文：Quantum Systems, a German drone maker backed by Peter Thiel, boosted its valuation to €3 billion ($3.5 billion) in a new funding round as the defense startup plans to increase production capacity of unmanned aerial systems.】

item.title: 国际清算银行总裁警告：对冲基金债券市场押注收益率飙升风险
item.description: 国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）行长巴勃罗-埃尔南德斯-德-科斯（Pablo Hernandez de Cos）对包括对冲基金在内的非银行公司在主权债券市场中的作用发出了警告。【原文：Bank for International Settlements head Pablo Hernandez de Cos has added his voice to escalating warnings about the role of non-bank firms including hedge funds in sovereign bond markets, at a time of historic government debt levels and a fraught geopolitical backdrop.】

item.title: 巴西就业市场降温，引发对一月降息的押注
item.description: 10 月份，正规就业岗位减少，这表明巴西的紧缩货币政策终于触及到了劳动力市场中一些最具弹性的领域。【原文：Formal job creation collapsed in October, a sign that Brazil’s tight monetary policy is finally reaching some of the labor market’s most resilient pockets.】

item.title: 英国央行官员淡化能源法案削减对通胀的影响
item.description: 英国央行利率制定者梅根-格林（Megan Greene）淡化了周三预算案中削减能源账单将有助于央行消除持续通胀威胁的希望。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Megan Greene played down hopes that a cut to energy bills at Wednesday’s budget will help the central bank stamp out the threat from sticky inflation.】

item.title: 英国淡化工人权利法案以缓解企业担忧
item.description: 英国政府放弃了工人权利旗舰方案中的一项关键措施，以平息企业的担忧。【原文：The UK government dropped a key measure from its flagship workers’ rights package in a bid to quell concerns of businesses who had warned the legislation would damage growth and employment.】

item.title: 环球报》报道：盎格鲁-泰克公司交易通过加拿大国家安全测试
item.description: 据《环球邮报》报道，加拿大政府以国家安全为由批准了英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）收购泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd.）的提议，为两家公司的合并扫清了障碍。【原文：The Canadian government has cleared Anglo American Plc’s proposed takeover of Teck Resources Ltd. on national security grounds, the Globe and Mail reported, removing one hurdle for the two companies to combine.】
